features.name: Dark Devotion
features.description: You have advantage on saving throws against being Charmed or Frightened.

features.name: Zeal
features.description: When you use an attacking action that targets only one enemy, you can target a second enemy.

features.name: Longsword
features.description: Melee: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d10 + 2) slashing and 3 (1d6) necrotic damage.
